item.title: mastodon.el: a Hydra to memorize/access it's many commands
item.description:
Mastodon has a lot of commands. You can access most of them directly via keybindings, just use M-x describe-mode or the h or ? keys. Can you remember them all?

But, if you don’t use Mastodon that regularly, maybe a Hydra can help you?
